question: 資本
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>main</kanji> <kanji>resources</kanji> are the <vocabulary>funds</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>capital</vocabulary> we're getting. Everything else can be gotten using said funds, which is why they're the main resources we have!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
